$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|All right, then. I've gathered you all
here today to present the Order's
incredibly important new mission!$k$pIt's called...$k$pOperation: Two-Hero Journey!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...And that's the...final name?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Yep! The plan is for squads of two
Heroes to journey to other worlds
and collect information.$k$pOh, and of course we can join
in on these journeys too—even
$Nu can!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Going on a trip with just yourself
and one other person sounds like
the makings of a thrilling adventure!$k$pI'd love to travel with just about any
Hero, including you all!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|With so many potentials to choose
from, your choice of partners will
be an important one.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|..Why is it limited to groups of two?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Excellent question, Sharena.$k$pFirstly, reconnaissance missions
are usually executed by squads
of specially selected operatives.$k$pThe smallest squad—and therefore
the squad with the most specialized
selection—is ideal for our purposes.$k$pSecondly, we are in the midst of
conflict on multiple fronts. I would
prefer to limit the forces sent out.$k$pThird and lastly, when you only have
yourself and your partner to rely on,
it can force you to improve.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I see... Wow! I hadn't thought of any
of that. You're amazing, Anna!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well, I wasn't made commander of
the Order of Heroes just because
of my business acumen, you know.$k$p...Oh, actually, there is one more
reason for putting a two-Hero limit
on the squads, come to think of it.$k$p$EFace_Cool|If we use only small groups,
the Order of Heroes saves
a ton of money!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...Why did that last point feel like
it had more enthusiasm behind it?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Er...go forth and select our first two
Heroes, $Nu!$k$p
